q_en: What raw materials are used by Skilled Sewers?

steps.sql: SELECT DISTINCT wm.id, m.name FROM sewing_material_allocation sma JOIN warehouse_material wm ON sma.warehouse_material_id = wm.id JOIN materials m ON wm.material_id = m.id JOIN sewing_tasks st ON sma.sewing_task_id = st.id JOIN working_group wg ON st.working_group_id = wg.id WHERE wg.name = 'Skilled Sewers';
steps.description: To find the raw materials used by the working group named 'Skilled Sewers', we need to retrieve the material_id and name of the materials allocated for sewing tasks assigned to this working group.

response:
Sure! Here is the answer to your question:

| Material ID | Material Name    |
|-------------|------------------|
| 1           | Cotton Fabric    |
| 3           | Wool             |
| 7           | Leather          |
| 9           | Synthetic Fiber  |
| 11          | Denim Fabric     |
| 13          | Down             |

These are the raw materials used by the working group named 'Skilled Sewers'. If you have any more questions, feel free to ask! ðŸ˜„
